name: Shibtama
description: SHIBTAMA is an ERC-20 project that seeks to reward holders by merging LP-fortifying tokenomics with rewards based utility. Liquidity growth via our automated LP feeding smart contract is an innovative yet simple mechanism by which token price and liquidity pool are continuously strengthened, with 4% of every transaction going directly to the pool. SHIBTAMA will continue to provide innovative ways to reward holders and grow in a safe and sustainable manner.
